meanings.def: time when you are not working or studying; free time
examples: These days we have more money and more leisure to enjoy it.
Make the most of your leisure time!

meanings.def: activities that you enjoy in your free time
examples: These days we have increased opportunities for leisure.
the leisure industry (= the business of providing leisure activities)
Spend the afternoon at leisure in the town centre.
Let's have lunch so we can talk at leisure.

meanings.def: when you have the time to do something without hurrying
examples: I suggest you take the forms away and read them at your leisure.

meanings.def: a man/woman who does not have to work

examples: Spend the afternoon at leisure in the town centre.
Let's have lunch so we can talk at leisure.

idioms.def: when you have the time to do something without hurrying
examples: I suggest you take the forms away and read them at your leisure.

idioms.def: a man/woman who does not have to work

related: marry in haste (, repent at leisure)
